title: 24-hour package lockers, Electronic vehicle charging stations
posting_body: BEAM is easy on the eyes.
Check out our beautiful surroundings, then imagine yourself at home.
Light and lively, BEAM apartments feel like a friendly hello.
From studios to two bedrooms, we’ve designed every space for style and speed.
Wired for the fastest internet, decked out with stainless appliances, and surrounded by windows to let the sunshine in!
BEAM offers the best of Seattle’s International District.
Explore a bustling community hub, bright with Vietnamese culture, cuisine, and character.
Known for its mash-up of markets, mom-and-pop import shops, and authentic culinary hot spots, BEAM shows off Seattle’s sunniest side.
Steps from downtown, minutes from Capitol Hill, with a 98 Walk Score, and a perfect 100 Transit Score, and the Seattle Streetcar right out your door.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 597 Sq.
- Air conditioning and wired with ports
- Beam Alley, a ground-level Vietnamese-style market with pop-up shops and local fare
- Fitness Center with tons of weight and cardio
Some restrictions and fee's may apply.
Follow I-5 S to S Dearborn St in Seattle.
Take 7th Ave S and S King St to your destination
Follow I-5 N to S Dearborn St in Seattle.
Continue on S Dearborn St to your destination
